byline.contributor: Hiroko Tabuchi and Matt Apuzzo reported from Washington, and Jack Ewing from London.
byline.original: By HIROKO TABUCHI, JACK EWING and MATT APUZZO

lead_paragraph: The officials charged in the case include a former head of development of the Volkswagen brand and the head of engine development.
snippet: The officials charged in the case include a former head of development of the Volkswagen brand and the head of engine development....

headline.main: 6 Volkswagen Executives Charged as Company Pleads Guilty in Emissions Case
headline.print_headline: 6 Executives Charged as Volkswagen Pleads Guilty in Emissions Case
